---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#setting up variables

S <-  c(5000000)
I <-  c(20)
R <-  c(0)

N = S[1] + I[1] + R[1]

Pspread <-  0.4
Pcontact <-  0.6
Precover <-  0.1
```

```{r}

#Staying Home A Lot
#Public Work Pcontact = 0.8
steps = 5000

for( i in 2:steps){

  S <- c(S, S[i-1] - (Pcontact * Pspread * I[i-1]/N * S[i-1]))
  I <- c(I, I[i-1] + (Pcontact * Pspread * I[i-1]/N * S[i-1]) - (Precover * I[i-1]))
  R <- c(R, R[i-1] + Precover * I[i-1])
  
  
}

data <- data.frame(S,I,R) %>% mutate(step = 1:n())
data
```

```{r}
data %>% ggplot(aes(x = step)) + geom_line(aes(y = S, color = "blue")) + geom_line(aes(y = I, color = "yellow")) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = R, color = "red")) + xlim(0,200)
```
